content: HFP Nylon drywall anchor Self-drilling nylon drywall anchor for faster, more reliable and more economical fastening to drywall ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - ### FEATURES:Features Faster, more precise positioning – “Shark’s tooth” tip design bites into drywall with ease as you start drilling No pre-drilling needed – these drywall anchors cut their own thread Available without or without screws – packages available including #8 x 1-3/16 screws Easier installation – set using any PH2 screwdriver, or the dedicated setting tool using a power drill/driver for ultimate efficiency Applications Plumbing Interior finishing Electrical installation ### TECHNICAL DATA: Environmental conditions: Indoor, dry conditions Material composition: Polyamide Technical Data | Environmental conditions | Indoor, dry conditions | Material composition | Polyamide | Type of fixing (global) | Pre-fastening ### ITEMS- 2158780 - Drywall anchor HFP w/ screws - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HFP 8 Drywall anchor - 3555251 - Drywall anchor HFP w/o screws MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1600x HSP 8 Drywall anchor - 3555252 - Drywall anchor HFP w/ screws MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1600x HFP 8 Drywall anchor - 2158779 - Drywall anchor HFP w/o screws - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HSP 8 Drywall anchor
